mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RVI_COMM_INT_DT DESC) NUM, RVI_COMM_ID as reviewID, RVI_COMM as reviewComm, RVI_COMM_INT_DT as regDate, ( SELECT USR_IMG FROM TBL_USR_INF B WHERE A.RVI_COMM_ID = B.USR_ID ) as userImg
FROM TBL_RVI_COMM A
WHERE HOME_ID = #{homeID} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY RVI_COMM_INT_DT DESC ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startListNo} AND #{endListNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_RVI_COMM( HOME_ID, USR_ID, RVI_COMM_ID, RVI_COMM, RVI_S_CL, RVI_S_A, RVI_S_C, RVI_S_L, RVI_S_CI, RVI_S_S, RVI_COMM_MOD_DT, RVI_COMM_INT_DT ) VALUES ( #{homeID}, #{userID}, #{reviewID}, #{reviewComm}, #{scoreCL}, #{scoreA}, #{scoreC}, #{scoreL}, #{scoreCI}, #{scoreS}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT A1.* , ROUND( ( A1.rate_cl + A1.rate_a + A1.rate_c + A1.rate_l + A1.rate_ci + A1.rate_s ) / 6 , 1 ) as total_rate FROM ( SELECT NVL( COUNT(*), 0 ) as total_count, ROUND( SUM(RVI_S_CL) / COUNT(*), 1 ) as rate_cl, ROUND( SUM(RVI_S_A) / COUNT(*), 1 ) as rate_a, ROUND( SUM(RVI_S_C) / COUNT(*), 1 ) as rate_c, ROUND( SUM(RVI_S_L) / COUNT(*), 1 ) as rate_l, ROUND( SUM(RVI_S_Ci) / COUNT(*), 1 ) as rate_ci, ROUND( SUM(RVI_S_S) / COUNT(*), 1 ) as rate_s FROM TBL_RVI_COMM GROUP BY HOME_ID HAVING HOME_ID = #{homeID} ) A1
